function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Security breach risk in wearable devices","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Barriers to innovation due to regulatory procedures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of technological awareness among the elderly population","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data security and patient confidentiality concerns","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Legal, regulatory, and policy challenges","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of adoption of available technology in health systems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges related to the design trade-offs, improved sensors, power, size, computation algorithms, and security","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of multifunctional capabilities in wearables","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unknown and novel viruses with similar patterns and symptoms may emerge in the future, leading to the possibility of facing another pandemic.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contagious respiratory illnesses pose a persistent threat to global well-being.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited control of environmental conditions and confounding factors in natural history studies.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mixed evidence and ongoing debate about the relationship between temperature and the spread of covid-19.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Influence of environmental factors such as temperature, humidity, and UV radiation on virus survivability and transmission rates.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible transmission of SARS-CoV-2 across countries through air travel","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Differences in the transmission potential of SARS-CoV-2 within a country due to vehicle concentration and urbanization","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health expenditure as a proxy for differences in countries’ commitment to population health","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential misinformation on covid-19 transmission and risk factors related to climate and geography","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unsubstantiated conclusions on the impact of heat and sunlight on SARS-CoV-2 transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Relying on seasonal variations to contain SARS-CoV-2 spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Analysis based on covid-19 cases per million inhabitants and country’s latitude could lead to oversimplified conclusions about disease propagation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited data set of 117 countries may not be representative of global disease propagation patterns","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to control for differential testing intensity may skew the analysis of disease propagation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reporting biases and incomplete coverage of testing approaches","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Factors such as health infrastructure, socioeconomic background, and health supplies affecting the spread of covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to assess seasonal patterns and mutated versions of SARS-CoV-2","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Positive association between latitude and number of covid-19 cases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in covid-19 cases per million inhabitants with increase in absolute latitude","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible boost in covid-19 impact due to increasing temperatures and longer sunlight exposure during summer","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Regulated air travel may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases such as covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate testing intensity can lead to underreporting of covid-19 cases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited health expenditure may result in insufficient healthcare resources during a pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential increase in social interactions due to higher temperatures may lead to greater transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global crises such as the covid-19 pandemic and economic depression increase susceptibility to contagious diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Nation-wide quarantines and lockdowns lead to economic impacts and social readjustment","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Significant drops in energy and electricity demand due to pandemic-related closures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential second waves of covid-19 infection","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increase in household energy consumption","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential recurring risk of pandemics exacerbated by climate change impacts","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through the interaction with home energy management systems in a pandemic.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through the use of hems technologies and the interaction with end-users","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reluctance of residents to adopt hems due to associated costs","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of willingness to pay for hems leading to slower market growth","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perceived lack of usefulness of technology","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Technology anxiety","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability of renters to make decisions on home improvements","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collection of internet-based survey data with potential for biased responses due to self-selection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Survey focused on New York Metropolitan Area, limiting generalizability to other regions","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on self-reported data for perceived risk of covid-19 infection and energy usage","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through in-person data collection","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate sanitation and hygiene during data collection","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"}]}
